content.rendered:
Ref: CXP096/2024

Criteria:

  • Matric
  • Own, reliable transport
  • Relevant qualification or Experience as a Chef in either disciplines
  • Love for crafting Tantalizing Meals
  • Excellent English communication skills
  • Must have positive / good attitude
  • Drive excellence in customer service
  • Willing to learn and be able to manage self and workspace very well
  • Prepared to work shifts, and overtime as needed

Apply via website or alternatively via: https://forms.gle/8mRbBqpY1WY7fSPs7
